name: Sprawl (necrosaint)
description:
(For optimal gameplay+visual experience, download standalone build)

Sprawl

Submission for GMTK 2020

Theme: Out of Control

Title: Sprawl

Sprawl is an isometric puzzle game where you race to prevent the city from sprawling out of bounds. The city will grow without you but help it grow by merging buildings to make larger ones and clicking to grow them faster! 

Start with a cozy little village and it won't be long until you find yourself overseeing a colossal urban jungle. Get the high score in our Challenge mode by growing the tallest city without hitting the boundary, or try out our Zen mode and watch your city grow without the pressure of controlling its size. 

Controls:

Left click - Grow/drag buildings

Scroll Wheel - Zoom

Click on the ground to build and grow buildings

Click and Drag buildings to move them.

Drag buildings onto others of the same type in order to merge and create larger ones.

Credits:

James Lucas: Project Manager/Programmer

Rio Kisjantoro: 3d Modelling/UI Design 

Ryan Baylis: Music
